C250.description: This course will cover methods and approaches for students considering professionalizing in the field of STS, including a chance for students to workshop written work.
C250.title: Science and Technology Studies Research Seminar

C200.description: This course provides a strong foundation for graduate work in STS, a multidisciplinary field with a signature capacity to rethink the relationship among science, technology, and political and social life. From climate change to population genomics, access to medicines and the impact of new media, the problems of our time are simultaneously scientific and social, technological and political, ethical and economic.
C200.title: Topics in Science and Technology Studies
